dt: {bc}to pay no attention to {bc}treat as unworthy of regard or notice

dt.t: Please {wi}disregard{/wi} what I said in my last email.

pt: {sc}neglect{/sc} {sc}disregard{/sc} {sc}ignore{/sc} {sc}overlook{/sc} {sc}slight{/sc} {sc}forget{/sc} mean to pass over without giving due attention. {sc}neglect{/sc} implies giving insufficient attention to something that merits one's attention.
{sc}ignore{/sc} implies a failure to regard something obvious.
{sc}overlook{/sc} suggests disregarding or ignoring through haste or lack of care.

pt.t: in my rush I {it}overlooked{/it} a key example

pt: {sc}slight{/sc} implies contemptuous or disdainful disregarding or omitting.

pt.t: {it}slighted{/it} several major authors in her survey

pt: {sc}forget{/sc} may suggest either a willful ignoring or a failure to impress something on one's mind.

shortdef: to pay no attention to : treat as unworthy of regard or notice

dt: {bc}the act of treating someone or something as unworthy of regard or notice {bc}the state of being disregarded {dx_def}see {dxt|disregard:1||}{/dx_def} {bc}{sx|neglect||}

dt.t: showed a complete {wi}disregard{/wi} for the rules

shortdef: the act of treating someone or something as unworthy of regard or notice : the state of being disregarded : neglect
